description: Dean Cox scores a 101st-minute winner for relegation-threatened Leyton Orient against Chesterfield in League One.
title: Chesterfield 2-3 Leyton Orient
maintext:
Dean Cox scored a 101st-minute winner for relegation-threatened Leyton Orient against Chesterfield in League One.
An injury to Chesterfield's Ian Evatt in eight minutes of added time saw the game extended further and Cox poked in after home keeper Tommy Lee fumbled.
Jay O'Shea gave the home side the lead with a penalty, before David Mooney tapped in to an open net to level.
Elliott Omozusi scored an own goal to restore Chesterfield's lead but Mooney drove in to level before Cox won it.
